You could start with something simple, like “I am capable of achieving my dreams.” You can write it down or say it out loud to yourself. One technique is progressive muscle relaxation. It involves tensing and then relaxing each muscle group. Would you like to try it now? Perfect! You can do this with each muscle group, working your way up to your head. It can help signal to your body that it’s time to unwind.
